Preprocess data for simulation

Source: R/3_preprocessing.R
ffs_preprocess_data.Rd

Performs joins, cleaning, filtering.

ffs_preprocess_data(conn, rosters, latest_rankings, adp_outcomes)

# S3 method for mfl_conn
ffs_preprocess_data(conn, rosters, latest_rankings, adp_outcomes)

# S3 method for sleeper_conn
ffs_preprocess_data(conn, rosters, latest_rankings, adp_outcomes)

# S3 method for espn_conn
ffs_preprocess_data(conn, rosters, latest_rankings, adp_outcomes)

# S3 method for flea_conn
ffs_preprocess_data(conn, rosters, latest_rankings, adp_outcomes)

Arguments

conn

a ff_connect object created by ffscrapr::ff_connect() and friends
rosters

a dataframe as created by ffscrapr::ff_rosters()
latest_rankings

a dataframe as created by ffs_latest_rankings()
adp_outcomes

a dataframe as created by ffs_adp_outcomes()
